name: Union_Battlefield_Recognition_Guide
author: Acrozatarim
description: A huge manual of 60 new NPC classes. Currently includes the APC, up to the Stormwing. Alpha version but all included NPCs are fully statted out and detailed. Original design by Acrozatarim, LCP coded by Sparks Murphey, Perijove, and FlagellatingFungus. Last updated 2020-10-25
